title: Artist & Label Partnerships Account Manager - Argentina & Chile
overview: The Artist & Label Partnerships Account Manager for Argentina & Chile is responsible for developing relationships with key artists, managers, and labels in order to position Spotify as the top partner for artist development and monetization in the region.
description:
